static const directx_va_mode_t DXVA_MODES[] = {

{ "H.264 stereo high profile, mbs flag set", &DXVA_ModeH264_VLD_Stereo_Progressive_NoFGT, 8, {1, 1}, 0, NULL, 0 }, { "H.264 stereo high profile", &DXVA_ModeH264_VLD_Stereo_NoFGT, 8, {1, 1}, 0, NULL, 0 }, { "H.264 multiview high profile", &DXVA_ModeH264_VLD_Multiview_NoFGT, 8, {1, 1}, 0, NULL, 0 },
